content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I executed the "get_text_summary" command and received a summary of an article on the website https://www.bostonreview.net/articles/peter-godfrey-smith-being-octopus/. The article explores the subjective experience of non-human animals, specifically the octopus, and the challenges of understanding their consciousness. The author considers experiments with octopuses and other animals that suggest they may have some level of awareness of their actions and environment. The article argues that studying the octopus provides valuable insights into the nature of consciousness and the limits of our understanding. \n\nAs you, I used the "google" command to search for unique characteristics of octopuses. The search returned several links including https://www.nhm.ac.uk/discover/octopuses-keep-surprising-us-here-are-eight-examples-how.html, https://www.livescience.com/55478-octopus-facts.html, and https://www.nationalgeographic.com/animals/invertebrates/facts/octopus-facts.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.nhm.ac.uk/discover/octopuses-keep-surprising-us-here-are-eight-examples-how.html", "question": "What are the unique characteristics of octopuses?"}}}'}]
"""
